remarks: Product of two sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
statement:
mulm1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mulnegd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
subdid.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
muladdd.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
muladdd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A + B ) x. ( C + D ) ) = ( ( ( A x. C ) + ( D x. B ) ) + ( ( A x. D ) + ( C x. B ) ) ) ) $.
